citations.narrative:
Required husbandry practices for general sanitation in one area of the production colony, including replacement of wet or
soiled feeders, removal of excessive hair from cage bottoms and trays, and cleaning of hose and rack supports in one
row, were not maintained to meet the standards of cleanliness expected for good animal welfare. All personnel involved in
animal care must be qualified and trained to meet the expected standards to maintain good animal welfare. The facility
must ensure that personnel caring for animals are fully qualified through the provision of training and instruction.
Correct by 13 February 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.32(a) 
   
Personnel qualifications. 
Required husbandry practices for general sanitation in one area of the production colony, including replacement of wet or 
soiled feeders, removal of excessive hair from cage bottoms and trays, and cleaning of hose and rack supports in one 
row, were not maintained to meet the standards of cleanliness expected for good animal welfare. All personnel involved in 
animal care must be qualified and trained to meet the expected standards to maintain good animal welfare. The facility 
must ensure that personnel caring for animals are fully qualified through the provision of training and instruction. 
 
Correct by 13 February 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
